2 weeks ago - This is a list of notable popcorn brands. Popcorn, also known as popping corn, is a type of corn (maize, Zea mays var. everta) that expands from the kernel and puffs up when heated. Popcorn is able to pop because its kernels have a hard moisture-sealed hull and a dense starchy interior.

May 1, 2025 - The American Pop Corn Company, established in 1914, is a family-owned business headquartered in Sioux City, Iowa. It is the oldest popcorn producer in the United States and is best known for its Jolly Time brand, which is sold nationally and internationally.
